description: This file defines controller functions for chat-related operations in an Express.js backend, including creating conversations, listing conversations and messages, and sending messages with AI-generated replies.

methods.name: createConversation
methods.description: Creates a new conversation record in the database.

methods.name: listConversations
methods.description: Retrieves a list of conversations from the database.

methods.name: listMessages
methods.description: Retrieves messages for a specific conversation.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a message, creating a conversation if needed, storing user message, generating AI reply, and storing assistant message.
